metadata.synopsis: The Visage of Cowardice is hiding in the secret lair, hoping that nobody will find it (or its loot.)
metadata.how_to_trigger: When entering the tollhouse, turn left to find Obedience, past Obedience is a door, go outside via the door and Cowardice is hiding in the room outside.

0.speaker: Visage of Cowardice
0.text: Please understand - I couldn't fight. Couldn't risk losing all this.
0.context: NodeContext: Frantic; trying to convince itself of its own lies
